Question
========

Given the following numbers: 7, 5, 8, 4, 9, 8, 7, 8. The estimated standard deviation of the sample mean is equal to

Answerlist
----------

* 0.36
* 0.56
* 0.6
* 1.69

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* 0.36: Incorrect
* 0.56: Incorrect
* 0.6: Incorrect
* 1.69: Correct
